text:
in a kingdom far far away there were three 
beautiful sisters their father who was the king

often held balls because 
his daughters loved to dance
but while each of the princesses danced very well

the youngest one could not dance 
as well as her older sisters

you could be a little bit more 
graceful when you dance mia

the little princess couldn't dance gracefully 
even though she really wanted to even the

guests around were looking at her strange 
dance and making fun of her among themselves

what kind of dance is this why is she 
moving like that i will never dance again

mia was so upset that she 
immediately left the ballroom

and locked herself in a cabin deep in the 
forest looking at the stars in the sky

thinking how to dance well she noticed a 
young man passing by the house the man was

dancing so gracefully and beautifully under the 
moonlight that mia admired him and went outside

at that moment when mia suddenly screamed because 
of a squirrel that was rushing between her feet

what was that the man stopped 
dancing and their eyes met

are you okay ma'am well i'm fine 
i think i was afraid of a squirrel
this is their nature ma'am please don't be scared

mia couldn't resist and asked the man how 
he danced so well the men showed the shoes

he was wearing i'm a shoemaker i use precious 
materials and make magic dance shoes that way

i can dance freely in the woods every night oh i 
can't believe it i need a shoemaker just like you

the shoemaker took out three pairs of magic 
shoes from his bag and placed them in front

of mia close your eyes make a wish and choose 
one of these three magical shoes for your luck

but remember every shoe has one big rule if 
you don't follow that rule the shoes can do

whatever magic they want on you mia immediately 
closed her eyes tightly the shoemaker on the

other hand swap the shoes to leave it to 
chance which magic shoes mia would pick

now you can choose a pair of shoes oh please 
let me be the most graceful dancing girl

at the ball mia selected the bright red 
shoes with her finger and opened her eyes

take them these are yours now but don't 
forget you should wear the shoes only

when you see the full moon if you do otherwise 
you can not take off these magic shoes anymore

that's the rule mia enthusiastically took 
the magic shoes and went to the palace

the princesses were very surprised 
to see their sister mia so excited

and happy mia where are you going 
that fast what is that in your hands

everyone gathered in the hall of the palace 
for another dance ball evening mia's princess

sister started to dance gracefully as 
usual in their most beautiful outfits

little princess mia put on the magic shoes she got 
from the shoemaker and danced in the palace hall

she danced so beautifully she kept up with the 
rhythm of the song so gently that the princess

sisters and guests marveled at me magnificent 
so gracefully wow she is dancing so beautifully

mia was dancing gracefully but the shoemaker's 
rule slipped from her mind because there was

no full moon in the sky that night while mia 
was dancing she slowly started disappearing

only her dancing magic shoes remained at 
that moment everyone in the hall started

screaming in fear and running away did 
you see that oh my gosh oh mia disappeared

mia opened her eyes when everyone was screaming 
but she couldn't understand what was going on

standing in front of the largest 
mirror in the living room

she saw only the magic shoes she was 
wearing not herself i've become invisible

i did not follow the rule of 
the shoes they stuck to my feet

i have to find that shoemaker no one could 
hear mia's voice in fact everyone was leaving

the palace in panic because of the red 
shoes running left and right in the hall

mia immediately ran out of the 
hall princess sisters followed her

three princess sisters were walking 
through the forest in the dark of night

when they arrived near the cabin 
they saw that young shoemaker

this man how well he is dancing hmm his shoes 
are just like mia's plus his bag is full of shoes

mia's sisters asked the shoemaker for help however 
when the shoemaker said that she had to wait until

the next full moon for the spell to break mia got 
very upset and started tapping her feet non-stop

there is one more solution but if we do that 
your shoes will lose their magic and become

just ordinary shoes if you agree hit your feet 
together three times mia thought it was better

to give up the shoes than to be invisible 
and she hit her feet together three times

the shoemaker in the front mia in the back they 
went to the bottom of the well a little further

away the shoemaker jumped to the bottom of the 
well seeing this the princess sisters were very

surprised after a while the shoemaker came out 
of the well with a full bucket in his hand i

will sprinkle this full moon dust at your feet 
and break the spell the spell was indeed broken

when the shoemaker sprinkled the full moon 
dust on the magic shoes and mia reappeared
her sisters immediately hugged her

mia you don't need spell or magic to dance 
gracefully because everyone should dance the

way they're happy yes yes you're right 
thank you shoemaker thank you so much

from that day on little princess mia danced 
in her own way as she always wanted to
